item.title: Tesla China Shipments Reportedly Fell 7% In 2025 Despite A December Surge, Days After EV Maker Lost Largest EV Maker Slot To BYD
item.description: Tesla’s shipments from its Shanghai plant in 2025 stood at 851,732 vehicles, declining by 7% from 2024.

item.description: A positive analyst action revived interest in the contract chipmaker’s stock.

item.title: Fake ‘MetaMask Support’ Emails Are Stealing Wallet Credentials, SlowMist Warns
item.description: MetaMask's official support documentation warns users that the wallet provider never initiates unsolicited contact.
